home.presentation: I like to create modern, intuitive and responsive web applications. I mainly work with React and Redux but I'm very enthusiastic about expanding my technical stack.

background.title: Background
background.studies: üéì After obtaining my Bachelor's degree in literature, I went to university to strengthen my skills in english, then I spent two years learning chinese.
background.working: üíº Then, for my first professional experience, I worked two years in a retail store of a major french brand.
background.training:
üíª I discovered that web development was a thing in 2018. Out of curiosity, I took some free courses on OpenClassrooms and just like that, I made my very first websites. I was excited - and still am - to find out all the things that I could create with a bit of logic and creativity. I registered at O'Clock school for an intensive six month remote training course. During the first three months, I learned the basics of web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL). 
 Then, as I felt really attracted by front-end and user interfaces, I chose React for my specialization course. The final month, I had the great opportunity to create a project from scratch and work with five other developers. From project management to final product development, following the scrum framework (sprints, daily meetings, retrospective), this project allowed me to apply the various skills I learned from the previous months.
background.diploma: I‚Äôve been certified by Opquast in 'Mastering Web Quality Assurance' and obtained a 'Web and Mobile Web Developer' state diploma in may 2021.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.traveling: üó∫Ô∏è Traveling around the world : For the past ten years, in self-organization, I‚Äôve had the chance to explore and discover 21 countries. I am quite simply unable to tell which one was the most incredible ; it has always been a series of unique experiences and encounters, but Japan and Greece definitely have a special place in my heart.
hobbies.hiking: ‚õ∞Ô∏è Hiking : As a child already, I spent every summer hiking in the Pyrenees with my family, and I never lost that interest while growing up. From Austrian Tyrol and Bulgarian Pirin National Park to impressive Norwegian fjords, every country I visited gave me opportunities to nurture this passion.
hobbies.gaming: üéÆ Video & board games : Either independant or big licenses games, RPG, TPS, strategy, open-world, ‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm curious enough to try every game that tickles my curiosity. All time favorites - at this time - : Hollow Knight, Outer Wilds, Stardew Valley. As for board games, I am more inclined to play cooperative games but I‚Äôm always up for a friendly competition.
hobbies.reading: üìö Reading : Voracious reader, I especially enjoy reading fantasy and science-fiction novels.

opquast.label: Mastering Web Quality Assurance delivered by

taleMe.description: Final month school project. Using the series 'The book where you're the hero' as a source of inspiration, TaleMe allows you to read, create and share interactive stories with other users. App created in a month, following Scrum methodology, in a team of 5 developers.

yaac.description: Web application that allows you to create a unique, personalized avatar and to download it. Project in tandem with a designer from Lille.

portfolio.description: Portfolio of websites and web applications I have had the opportunity to work on.

contact.text: I‚Äôm currently living in Lille, France but I‚Äôm open to international opportunities. I‚Äôm interested in the entire frontend spectrum and in working on socially engaged projects with positive people. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I‚Äôll get back to you as soon as I can !
